title: Forever Worthy of Your Love - Novel Updates
author: 蓝莓爱芝士
description: There are rumors that the Fifth Young Mistress of the well-known Hua family is ugly and has a stuttering problem. Her parents do not dote on her, and she must go through an arranged marriage with an infamous playboy. On the fateful day of her wedding, the groom leaves her at the altar, yet she manages to turn the tables on him by finding a replacement groom at the very last minute. Everyone gradually becomes aware that she is in fact a captivating beauty capable of eloquent speech and that she possesses great intellect. She is no longer living in seclusion, and her brilliance will soon be revealed. However, she will also have to deal with the huge problem of her pesky newfound husband.>
